Body:
collection = lookup.TemplateLookup()
collection.put_string('base',
    """
            this is the base.
            ${next.body()}
        """)
collection.put_string('index',
    """
            <%inherit file="base"/>
            <%page args="x, y, z=7"/>
            print ${x}, ${y}, ${z}
        """
    )
try:
    print(collection.get_template('index').render(x=5, y=10))
    assert False
except TypeError:
    assert True
